dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Did you hear about that earthquake in Kazakhstan's Zhetysu region?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Did you hear about that earthquake in Kazakhstan's Zhetysu region?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An earthquake was recorded in Kazakhstan's Zhetysu region, according to the country's Ministry of Emergency Situations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw something about it. It happened at 7:51 p.m. on May 27th, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw something about it. It happened at seven fifty one p.m. on May twenty seventh, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The tremor was registered at 7:51 p.m. Astana time on May 27, 2025, by the network of seismic stations operated by the National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research picked it up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research picked it up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The tremor was registered at 7:51 p.m. Astana time on May 27, 2025, by the network of seismic stations operated by the National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it was only a 2-point intensity at the Kapal-Arasan sanatorium station, so pretty mild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it was only a two-point intensity at the Kapal-Arasan sanatorium station, so pretty mild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary data, the tremor was felt at an intensity of 2 points at the Kapal-Arasan sanatorium station (health resort).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, thankfully no casualties or damage reported, which is always a relief.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, thankfully no casualties or damage reported, which is always a relief.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There have been no reports of casualties or damage, the ministry's press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But it's interesting, um, they mentioned another one earlier near Taldykorgan too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's interesting, um, they mentioned another one earlier near Taldykorgan too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, an earthquake occurred near Taldykorgan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so maybe there's some increased activity in that area lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so maybe there's some increased activity in that area lately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think people even felt it? A 2 is pretty subtle, like, you might just think it's a truck passing by or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think people even felt it? A two is pretty subtle, like, you might just think it's a truck passing by or something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Probably, unless you were in a really quiet place. Still, seismic stations don't miss much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably, unless you were in a really quiet place. Still, seismic stations don't miss much.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. I wonder if this is part of a pattern or just an isolated event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. I wonder if this is part of a pattern or just an isolated event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say without more data, but the region does have some history with tremors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hard to say without more data, but the region does have some history with tremors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and with no damage, it's more of a curiosity than a crisis this time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and with no damage, it's more of a curiosity than a crisis this time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Let's hope it stays that way if there are any more.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Let's hope it stays that way if there are any more.
